content:
Kabali and Katera 
 Mily Kasule 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 Kabali and Katera are friends. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kabali has a cat. 
 
 Katera has a rabit. 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 Kabali plays with his cat 
 
 every day. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Katera feds his rabit 
 
 twice a day. 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 Katera's rabit produced six babies. 
 
 Two rabits were black. Two rabits were brown. 
 
 Two rabits were white. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kabaliâ€™s cat produced thre babies. 
 
 One kiten was male. 
 
 Two kitens were female. 
 
 6  
 
 
 Katera sold four of the baby rabits. 
 
 He used the money to buy boks and 
 
 pencils for schol. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Kabali did not sel any kitens. 
 
 The people in the vilage did not want cats. 
 
 
 8
